keyInsights.insight: $312 spent on 74 zero-conversion search terms (89% of visible spend).
Only 31% Search Impression Share — missing 69% of eligible searches.
Top performer: "CTM -Wedding Venues" at 3.37x ROAS ($890 spend, $3,000 revenue).

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 3 conversion actions (2x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM). Recording 20 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Not enabled. With 20 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 2 conversion categories: 2x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 1x SUBMIT_LEAD_FORM.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: No obvious duplicate conversion actions detected.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: No GA4 conversion actions found. Link GA4 for cross-device tracking and audience insights.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 3 actions recording 20 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $312 spent on 74 zero-conversion search terms (89% of $352 visible search spend). Top waste: "yandina station wedding cost" $21, "wedding venues" $18, "sunshine coast wedding venues" $14, "wedding venues queensland" $11, "wedding venues noosa" $9.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: No negative keyword lists. Create themed lists immediately to stop wasted spend on irrelevant queries.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: No negative lists to apply. Build and attach lists to all campaigns.

checks.name: Match type performance
checks.finding: No broad match keywords active. PHRASE: $890, 20 conv. EXACT: $0, 0 conv. BROAD: $0, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: No significant zero-conversion keyword spend detected.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 1 naming prefix(es) across 1 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 1 ad groups across 1 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 1 campaigns: 1 SEARCH.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: No active PMax. Consider launching with strong asset groups and audience signals.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 1 campaigns, $45/day budget, 31% Search Impression Share. Top: CTM -Wedding Venues (3.37x ROAS, $890).

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $45/day budget, ~$30/day actual spend (66% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: Correctly using "Presence" targeting.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: Avg QS: 2.5/10 across 2 scored keywords (0 at 7+, 2 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$13/month. Top offenders: "wedding venues near me" QS 4 ($80 spend, ~$13 premium).

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 0 of 448 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: Avg QS 2.5 indicates poor keyword-to-ad relevance. Tighten ad group themes and include keywords in headlines.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: 3 RSAs: 0 Good/Excellent, 3 need improvement (3 AVERAGE).

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: No active PMax campaigns.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 11.61%. Strong CTR.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Manual CPC with 20 conversions/month. Enough data for Smart Bidding — switch to Target ROAS or Target CPA.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 31% Search Impression Share — missing 69% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: Using automated bidding.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 4 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 14 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 2 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 32 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 1 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 4 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: No Customer Match lists. Upload CRM emails/phones for lookalike targeting and customer exclusion.

quickWins.action: Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "yandina station wedding cost", "wedding venues", "sunshine coast wedding venues"... — $312 wasted.
Fix: Enhanced conversions — Not enabled. With 20 conversions/month, every lost signal degrades bidding. Enable in Goals > Conversions > Settings.
Fix: Server-side tracking — No server-side tracking. Browser-based tracking misses 10-25% of conversions. Implement server-side GTM or API conversion imports.
Fix: Negative keyword lists — No negative keyword lists. Create themed lists immediately to stop wasted spend on irrelevant queries.
Fix: Account-level negatives — No negative lists to apply. Build and attach lists to all campaigns.
Fix: Brand campaign — No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.
Fix: Quality Score — Avg QS: 2.5/10 across 2 scored keywords (0 at 7+, 2 below 5). Est. CPC premium from low-QS keywords: ~$13/month. Top offenders: "wedding venues near m

items: $312 wasted on 74 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "yandina station wedding cost", "wedding venues", "sunshine coast wedding venues", "wedding venues queensland", "wedding venues noosa".
Create a brand Search campaign to protect branded terms from competitors.
Build 3+ themed negative keyword lists (Competitors, Job seekers, Irrelevant terms) and attach to all campaigns.
1 campaign(s) are above target ROAS: CTM -Wedding Venues (3.37x). Increase budget by 15% to capture more of the 69% missed impressions.
Test Smart Bidding — 20 conversions/month is enough data. Run an experiment with Target ROAS or Maximize Conversions.
Build remarketing audiences (all visitors 30d, cart abandoners, converters) and upload Customer Match lists from CRM.
Increase Search Impression Share from 31% — you're missing 69% of potential customers.
Scale top performer "CTM -Wedding Venues" (3.37x ROAS) — increase budget 10-15% weekly while monitoring CPA stability.
